verbs.description:
.

The Trump administration [V: is] looking to build tent cities at military posts around Texas to shelter the increasing number of unaccompanied migrant children being held in detention . The Department of Health and Human Services will visit Fort Bliss , a sprawling Army base near El Paso in the coming weeks to look at a parcel of land where the administration is considering building a tent city to hold between 1,000 and 5,000 children , according to U.S. officials and other sources familiar with the plans.

.
